title: Chicken Korma
Description: Chicken Korma is a rich and flavorful Indian dish made with succulent pieces of chicken simmered in a creamy, aromatic curry. This royal dish is a perfect blend of spices, yogurt, and nuts, creating a dish that's both mild and indulgent.
ingredient_list: 500g boneless, skinless chicken, cut into cubes
method_list: In a blender, blend soaked cashews and yogurt into a smooth paste.
In a large pan, heat ghee or oil. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add chicken pieces and cook until they are browned on all sides.
Add ground turmeric, coriander, cumin, chili powder, cardamom powder, cinnamon powder, and salt. Mix well.
Pour in the cashew-yogurt paste and stir to combine.
Cover and simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the curry thickens.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan.
